explains: n. 开司米；山羊绒；克什米尔羊毛
wordGroup: cashmere sweater 羊绒衫；开司米羊毛衫

sentences.en: Amy had bought a soft, jade green cashmere jacket for Helen.
sentences.cn: 埃米给海伦买了一件柔软的、翠绿色的山羊绒短上衣。

sentences.en: Her wardrobe consists primarily of huge cashmere sweaters and tiny Italian sandals.
sentences.cn: 她的衣服主要是宽大的开司米毛衣和纤小的意大利凉鞋。

sentences.en: It has the advantages of both cashmere and mulberry silk.
sentences.cn: 它具有羊绒和桑蚕丝两者的优点。
